titleStmt.title: Eighteene choice and usefull sermons, by Benjamin Hinton, B.D. late minister of Hendon. And sometime fellow of Trinity Colledge in Cambridge. Imprimatur, Edm: Calamy. 1650.
titleStmt.author: Hinton, Benjamin.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for Humphery Moseley, at the Princes Armes in S. Pauls Church-yard, and for R. Wodenothe, at the Starre under S. Peters Church in Cornehill,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Mar. 15."; the imprimatur date has been crossed out; the imprint date has been altered to 1649.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
